opcode| rs  | rd  |  immed/func  
111000|00000|00001|0000001010101010   --li $1,682
111000|00000|00010|0000000100000001   --li $2,257
100000|00001|00100|00010|00000|110000 --add $4,$1,$2
011111|00000|00010|0000000000000100   --sw $2,4($0)
000011|00000|01010|0000000000000100   --lb $10,4($0)
110000|00001|10000|0000000000000100   --addi $16,$1,4
111000|00000|00110|0000000100000001   --li $6,257
000000|00010|00110|0000000000000001   --beq $5,$2,1(*4 +(PC+4)) #skip next inst if true
111111|00000|00000|1111111111111110   --b -2(*4 +(PC+4))
111000|00000|00011|0000000100111111   --li $3,319
111111|00000|00000|0000000000000010   --b 2 (*4 +(PC+4))
100000|00001|00111|00010|00000|110010 --and $7,$1,$2
